name: Isolation (itch) (KSoftLabs)
description:
While you are cruising through the space an asteroid hit your ship and damaged your weapon system. To make the things worse a fleet of enemy ships just appeared. Turn on your shields to max and survive as long as you can. Keep your ship isolated and shielded from enemy ships and bullets.

  • Drag anywhere on screen to change the direction of your shield.

Credits:

https://ravenmore.itch.io/space-shooter-assets-space-rage
https://dinvstudio.itch.io/dynamic-space-background-lite-free
https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack
